data.description:
Medical Imaging XR
Medical Imaging XR is the DICOM viewer for Quest 3. Visualize, edit, and discuss medical imaging in collaborative teams. Dive into 3D DICOM, STL, OBJ, and engage with 2D medical data from ultrasound, PDF, and videos. 

Upload your data here: https://link.medicalholodeck.com/
Tutorial: https://www.medicalholodeck.com/en/support/tutorials-manuals/medical-imaging-x

Notes:
- Activate passthrough in the app settings.
- For optimal performance on Quest 3, use small to medium-sized 3D medical images (DICOM). If experiencing low framerates, lower the DICOM quality and reduce the display size.
- This product is intended solely for educational purposes and is not a medical device. For professional use, please contact info@medicalholodeck.com.

Dissection Master XR
Dissection Master XR offers a virtual reality experience for detailed anatomy study and dissection, utilizing real human data. Itâ€™s designed for educational and medical teaching purposes, providing the whole body in 10 highly detailed layers.

RecordXR
RecordXR is the recorder for the metaverse. Create, capture, and share content in a new dimension of digital interaction. RecordXR records not just visuals, but the full depth of your interactions and activities, and stores it in an easily distributable file. 

Access free Medicalholodeck lessons:
https://www.medicalholodeck.com/en/store/#lessons

Tutorials and Manuals
https://www.medicalholodeck.com/en/support/

Support
support@medicalholodeck.com
